description: Gets information about the specified certificate. Requires permission to access the DescribeCertificate action.

parameters.name: certificateId
parameters.description: The ID of the certificate. (The last part of the certificate ARN contains the certificate ID.)

nested_items.name: certificateDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the certificate.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the certificate.

nested_items.name: certificateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the certificate.

nested_items.name: caCertificateId
nested_items.description: The certificate ID of the CA certificate used to sign this certificate.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the certificate.

nested_items.name: certificatePem
nested_items.description: The certificate data, in PEM format.

nested_items.name: ownedBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the certificate.

nested_items.name: previousOwnedBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account of the previous owner of the certificate.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the certificate was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the certificate was last modified.

nested_items.name: customerVersion
nested_items.description: The customer version of the certificate.

nested_items.name: transferData
nested_items.description: The transfer data.

nested_items.name: transferMessage
nested_items.description: The transfer message.

nested_items.name: rejectReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the transfer was rejected.

nested_items.name: transferDate
nested_items.description: The date the transfer took place.

nested_items.name: acceptDate
nested_items.description: The date the transfer was accepted.

nested_items.name: rejectDate
nested_items.description: The date the transfer was rejected.

nested_items.name: generationId
nested_items.description: The generation ID of the certificate.

nested_items.name: notBefore
nested_items.description: The certificate is not valid before this date.

nested_items.name: notAfter
nested_items.description: The certificate is not valid after this date.

nested_items.name: certificateMode
nested_items.description: The mode of the certificate.
